mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT m.MOVIE_NO AS MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE AS MOVIE_TITLE, m.RUNTIME AS RUNTIME, b.BOOK_NO AS BOOK_NO, b.BOOK_COST AS BOOK_COST, b.BOOK_TOTAL_COST AS BOOK_TOTAL_COST, b.COST_PROCESS AS COST_PROCESS, COUNT(ss.SEAT_NO) AS TOTALTICKETS, s.SCREEN_NAME AS SCREEN_NAME, LISTAGG(ss.SEAT_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ss.SEAT_NO) AS SEATNO, p.PLAYTIME AS PLAYTIME, p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440) AS ENDTIME, po.FILE_CODENAME AS FILE_CODENAME, po.IMAGE_PATH AS IMAGE_PATH FROM BOOKING b JOIN BOOKING_SEAT bs ON b.BOOK_NO = bs.BOOK_NO JOIN PLAYING p ON bs.PLAYING_NO = p.PLAYING_NO JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO JOIN SCREEN_SEAT ss ON bs.SSEAT_NO = ss.SSEAT_NO LEFT JOIN POSTER po ON m.MOVIE_NO = po.MOVIE_NO WHERE b.STATUS = 'Y' AND b.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND po.FILE_LEVEL = '1' AND p.PLAYTIME >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1) GROUP BY m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE, m.RUNTIME, b.BOOK_NO, b.BOOK_COST, b.BOOK_TOTAL_COST, b.COST_PROCESS, s.SCREEN_NAME, p.PLAYTIME, (p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440)), po.FILE_CODENAME, po.IMAGE_PATH ORDER BY CASE WHEN p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440) > SYSDATE THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, p.PLAYTIME ASC

SELECT m.MOVIE_TITLE AS MOVIE_TITLE, s.SCREEN_NAME AS SCREEN_NAME, p.PLAYTIME AS PLAYTIME, b.MODIFY_DATE AS MODIFY_DATE, b.BOOK_COST AS BOOK_COST, LISTAGG(ss.SEAT_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ss.SEAT_NO) AS SEATNO FROM BOOKING b JOIN BOOKING_SEAT bs ON b.BOOK_NO = bs.BOOK_NO JOIN PLAYING p ON bs.PLAYING_NO = p.PLAYING_NO JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO JOIN SCREEN_SEAT ss ON bs.SSEAT_NO = ss.SSEAT_NO WHERE b.STATUS = 'N' AND b.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND p.PLAYTIME >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY m.MOVIE_TITLE, s.SCREEN_NAME, p.PLAYTIME, b.MODIFY_DATE, b.BOOK_COST ORDER BY p.PLAYTIME ASC

SELECT c.COUPON_NAME AS COUPON_NAME, cu.BOOK_NO AS BOOK_NO FROM COUPON_USER cu JOIN COUPON c ON cu.COUPON_NO = c.COUPON_NO JOIN BOOKING b ON cu.BOOK_NO = b.BOOK_NO WHERE b.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND b.STATUS = 'Y' AND cu.COUPON_USE = 'O'

SELECT m.MOVIE_NO AS MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE AS MOVIE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(p.PLAYTIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD (DY) HH24:MI') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440), 'HH24:MI') AS PLAYTIME, s.SCREEN_NAME AS SCREEN_NAME, COUNT(ss.SEAT_NO) AS TOTALTICKETS, po.FILE_CODENAME AS FILE_CODENAME, po.IMAGE_PATH AS IMAGE_PATH FROM BOOKING b JOIN BOOKING_SEAT bs ON b.BOOK_NO = bs.BOOK_NO JOIN PLAYING p ON bs.PLAYING_NO = p.PLAYING_NO JOIN MOVIE m ON p.MOVIE_NO = m.MOVIE_NO JOIN SCREEN s ON p.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO JOIN SCREEN_SEAT ss ON bs.SSEAT_NO = ss.SSEAT_NO LEFT JOIN POSTER po ON m.MOVIE_NO = po.MOVIE_NO WHERE b.STATUS = 'Y' AND b.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND (p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440)) < SYSDATE AND po.FILE_LEVEL = '1' GROUP BY m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE, p.PLAYTIME, s.SCREEN_NAME, (p.PLAYTIME + (m.RUNTIME / 1440)), po.FILE_CODENAME, po.IMAGE_PATH ORDER BY p.PLAYTIME DESC
